config.clienttweaks.title: Client Tweaks
config.clienttweaks.tweaks.autoClimbLadd: This option will let you climb ladders automatically by just looking upwards, rather than requiring a key to be held down.
config.clienttweaks.tweaks.doNotUseLastT: This prevents the last torch in the offhand from being placed.
config.clienttweaks.tweaks.hideOffhandIt: This option will hide your offhand item. It can be toggled via an optional key binding.
config.clienttweaks.tweaks.hideOwnPartic: This option will hide your own potion particle effects for your client (other players will still see them).
config.clienttweaks.tweaks.hideShieldUnl: This option will hide your shield unless you are holding a weapon.
config.clienttweaks.tweaks.noOffhandTorc: This prevents torches from being placed from your offhand at all.
This prevents torches from being placed from your offhand if you have a block in your main hand.
This prevents torches from being placed from your offhand if you have food in your main hand.
No Offhand Torch With Empty Hand
This prevents torches from being placed from your off hand if you have an empty main hand.
config.clienttweaks.tweaks.offhandTorchW: This restricts torches to be placed from the offhand only when you're holding a tool in your main hand.
config.clienttweaks.tweaks.disableStepAs: This option will disable step assist added by other mods.
config.clienttweaks.tweaks.disableLogStr: This option will disable log stripping.
config.clienttweaks.tweaks.masterVolumeS: This adds back the master volume slider to the options screen. Saves you a click!
config.clienttweaks.tweaks.musicVolumeSl: This adds back the music volume slider to the options screen. Saves you a click!
config.clienttweaks.tweaks.paneBuildingS: This option will make iron fences and glass panes have a bigger hitbox while placing them, making it easier to aim.
config.clienttweaks.tweaks.noRecipeBookS: This option makes the recipe book not shift the inventory when opened. Works best with smaller GUI scales / bigger resolutions.
config.clienttweaks.customization.torchI: Items that count as torches for the offhand-torch tweak options.
config.clienttweaks.customization.torchT: Items that are allowed to place torches from the offhand if offhandTorchWithToolOnly is enabled.
config.clienttweaks.customization.shield: Items that count as weapons for the offhand-shield hiding tweak options.
Items that count as shields for the offhand-shield hiding tweak options.
